title: Love in Tight Places
description: Somewhere along the path to thirty-eight years of age, Londoner Cilla Bicknell's life took a wrong turn. Her loveless marriage is falling apart, all of her female friends have vanished, and her grown children no longer "need" her, but what does Cilla need?When a chance meeting with gorgeous young Australian Will Sears on the tube leads her into unchartered erotic territory, Cilla must reassess her life and her loves and determine the price of happiness. But what is Will's dark secret, and will he lead her to everlasting love, or to heartbreak and ruin? And when love is crammed into such tight spaces, can it ever expand enough to fill the void in Cilla's heart?
author: Silky Phelan
